# Introduction

a simple package that creates some extensions to a pandas dataframe for handling financial functions

## Getting Started

The main purpose of this simple lib is to have some convenience functions for easy handling of pandas
dataframes when working with time series data. At the moment is this the focus of the implementation.

## Example

```python
>>> import financefunctions as ff
>>> import eod2pd
>>> df = eod2pd.get_symbols_prices(["BMW.XETRA","BAS.XETRA"], dict_result=False)
>>> df

>>> df.ff.subcols("adjusted_close")
```
